revision.text: {{Infobox Key Item |name = Gem Case |image = [[File:ShardCase_HighRes.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Gem Case''. |use = Allows collection of [[Gems]] |obtain = Defeat [[Kanto|Giovanni]] }} Gems are an item dropped when defeating any kind of Pok√©mon once the player has the [[Gem Case]] unlocked. These typed Gems can be invested into the Gems tab to increase [[Type Effectiveness|type effectivity]], and your damage output. They can also be used to purchase and use [[Flutes|flutes]].
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
